<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeProximityFade"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeProximityFade

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A visual shader node representing proximity fade effect.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The proximity fade effect fades out each pixel based on its distance to another object.
